segments.text: Mary , Pam and I are going to the mall later to buy some new clothes . Do you want to come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you say it again slowly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pam and I are wondering if you'd like to go to the mall with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . I'll have to sink about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mary , you're going to have to work on your pronunciation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But give yourself some time . You just got here .
segments.speaker: S1
